parameters.lotsize: Lot size of a property in square feet.
parameters.recreation: Factor. Does the house have a recreational room?
parameters.driveway: Factor. Does the house have a driveway?
parameters.fullbase: Factor. Does the house have a full finished basement?
parameters.prefer: Factor. Is the house located in the preferred neighborhood of the city?
parameters.aircon: Factor. Is there central air conditioning?
parameters.gasheat: Factor. Does the house use gas for hot water heating?

description:
Description
Sales prices of houses sold in the city of Windsor, Canada, during July, August and September, 1987.
title: House Prices in the City of Windsor, Canada
reference: Journal of Applied Econometrics Data Archive.
format: A data frame containing 546 observations on 12 variables.
